snippet: The president speaks with Senator Joe Manchin III, the West Virginia Democrat, as the White House works to develop a comprehensive response to the shootings in Connecticut including active support for ban on assault weapons.
abstract: The president speaks with Senator Joe Manchin III, the West Virginia Democrat, as the White House works to develop a comprehensive response to the shootings in Connecticut including active support for ban on assault weapons.

headline.main: Obama Talks to Pro-Gun Senator; White House Sketches Policy Shift
